content:
Other changes to pay attention to

print/fo output modes

tei-publisher-lib 3.x.x reassigns the output mode print to generate HTML output targetted at print. In older version print was defined as an alias for fo. You may thus have to change your ODDs if you used the fo mode. A more elaborate explanation of the changes is presented in this e-editiones article.

pb-facsimile/pb-facs-link

The behaviour of the pb-facsimile and pb-facs-link webcomponents has changed: pb-facs-link must now emit to the event channel pb-facsimile is listening to. Previously emitting to the default channel was enough. You should thus change all pb-facs-link elements generated by your ODD to include an @emit attribute targetting the correct channel.

HTML template links

If links, in particular in the menu, stop working and the indicated URL contains ${...}, check the corresponding code in the HTML template. If it has an attribute data-template="lib:parse-params", change it to data-template="pages:parse-params". It should also be safe to run a search/replace operation on all .html files in templates/.

changed start page and templates

The start page of the TEI Publisher app has changed: it now integrates a full text search and drops the `pb-browse-docs` component in favour of a plain `pb-load` and associated form controls. This gives users more flexibility.

Old start pages using `pb-browse-docs` will still work as before, so you don't need to take any action here. However, if you would like to upgrade, you'll need to manually compare and update `templates/index.html`.
